content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0). It is currently not smelting because it has no ingredients to smelt. It has coal in its fuel inventory.

### Iron Ore Mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -49.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-17.5, -47.5)

The burner mining drill is mining iron ore but is waiting for space in the destination (the wooden chest) to put the mined ore. The burner mining drill's fuel inventory is full.

## ERROR TIPS

### Could not insert item: Inventory is full
- The burner mining drill's fuel inventory was full when attempting to insert coal. Check the inventory of the target entity before attempting to insert items.

### Cannot craft item: Missing ingredients
- When crafting a wooden chest, the agent failed because it didn't have wood. Ensure you have the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. Wood is a raw resource that must be gathered first.

### Could not insert item: No item to insert
- When inserting iron ore into the furnace, the agent failed because it didn't have any iron ore in its inventory. Ensure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables:
- None
### Functions:
- None
